title: Khirbet Abu Hamdan
text: Khirbet Abu Hamdan () is a <a href="Syria">Syria</a>n village in the <a href="Safita%20District">Safita District</a> in <a href="Tartous%20Governorate">Tartous Governorate</a>. According to the <a href="Central%20Bureau%20of%20Statistics%20%28Syria%29">Syria Central Bureau of Statistics</a> (CBS), Khirbet Abu Hamdan had a population of 925 in the 2004 census.
